description: Mistress Lorelei Lee cannot be charmed. She cannot be sweet talked. She cannot be won over. The only thing that please Mistress Lee is for you to get on your knees & show her your devotion. Stupid slave. Haven’t you leaned. You’re worthless. You’re nothing. No mater how hard you try you will always remain dirt under Mistress Lorelei Lee’s heel.
title: Helpless and Mesmerized by Lorelei Lee
